issue.title: Robot pose relative to the artifact origin available away from staging area

content.raw: Ignition just stores all the meshes in your home directory, creating that folder \(just like ~/.ros is where all the ros logs reside\).  I don’t think it overwrites the files – though it would be nice if it checked an md5 or something to verify versions.
content.html: Ignition just stores all the meshes in your home directory, creating that folder (just like ~/.ros is where all the ros logs reside). I don’t think it overwrites the files – though it would be nice if it checked an md5 or something to verify versions.
